featured.text: Google, which already uses prototypes of such cars to ferry its staff along Californian freeways, once put a blind man in a prototype and filmed him being driven off to buy takeaway hamburgers.
Some words, such as “sandwich” and “hamburger,” were ______

definition.zh_def: 漢堡：一種由兩片麵包夾著肉餅和其他配料的食品。
definition.en_def: A hamburger is a food item consisting of a cooked patty of ground meat, usually beef, placed inside a sliced bun, often accompanied by various toppings.
definition.example: I ordered a cheeseburger with lettuce and tomato.
